EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P Post Event Email to Attendees 10-2-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining us at SpringOne Platform, let us know what you thought!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[springoneplatform.io]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
With thousands of attendees,160+ talks, 200+ speakers, 32 main stage presenters, and 50 sponsors, we hope SpringOne Platform 2018 was an incredible experience for you! Thank you for being part of it!
Bring SpringOne Platform Home Main stage and breakout session recordings are being added daily. Subscribe to Pivotal’s YouTube playlist <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQsR_aqYBQxpYTEQZnjhTN6&disable_polymer=true]]> to be notified when new and public recordings become available. And catch up through our blog recaps from Monday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/springone-platform-2018-day-1-recap?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-post-event-2018]]>, Tuesday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/springone-platform-2018-day-2-recap?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-post-event-2018]]>, Wednesday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/springone-platform-2018-day-3-recap]]> and Thursday <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/springone-platform-2018-day-4-recap?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-post-event-2018]]>.
Check Out All the News from SpringOne Platform PKS 1.2, Pivotal Cloud Foundry 2.3, Pivotal Act, 2018 Partner of the Year awards—you can check out all the news from the conference here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-post-event-2018]]>.
Save the Date: October 7–10, 2019 If you liked the presos and videos <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-post-event-2018]]> from this year, just wait and see what we have in store for 2019. Sign up <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-post-event-2018]]> to stay informed, and join us in Austin, Texas.
Tell us what you thought Please fill out this quick, three-minute survey <[[https://springoneplatform.io/survey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-post-event-2018]]> so we can make SpringOne Platform an amazing experience next year.
We hope to see you next year!
The SpringOne Platform and Pivotal Teams
